contact.title: Contact

about.title: About
about.description: Discover more about my journey, aspirations, and ambitions in the world of AI.

contents.name: My Background
contents.description: Hello, I'm Vijay Chandar. I was born in Maryland, USA, and raised in Chennai, India. My journey has led me to pursue a career in AI, and I'm currently working as an AI intern at Samyak Tech Labs.

contents.name: Current Focus
contents.description: I'm dedicated to becoming an AI engineer with a deep interest in fine-tuning and developing novel algorithms and models tailored by data. My current work involves continuous learning and applying new concepts to real-world challenges.

contents.name: Future Goals
contents.description: Inspired by the groundbreaking work of companies like Cerebras and Groq, I aim to build a tech startup that pushes the boundaries of AI. My goal is to contribute significantly to the AI community and open-source projects, moving beyond the development of traditional chatbots.

contents.name: Vision
contents.description: I aspire to create innovative AI solutions that can address complex problems. My ultimate dream is to lead a startup that drives technological advancements and inspires others to explore new frontiers in AI.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Explore my experiences, certifications, and education, particularly in AI and cloud computing.

contents.name: Samyak Tech Labs
contents.description: Developing AI-driven solutions with a focus on fine-tuning large language models, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and utilizing the OpenAI and Cohere APIs. Worked with frameworks like LlamaIndex to build a multilingual chatbot for Jyot, a Gujarati religious institution, effectively handling unstructured textual and audio data.

list.name: Next.js
list.info: React framework for building web applications
list.description: Utilized Next.js for building server-side rendered and statically generated web applications, enhancing performance and SEO.

list.name: AWS Lambda
list.description: Leveraged AWS Lambda to create and manage serverless functions, enabling scalable and cost-effective cloud computing.

list.name: Azure Container Registries
list.description: Managed Docker container images with Azure Container Registries for seamless deployment and scalability in cloud environments.

list.name: Docker
list.description: Utilized Docker for creating and managing containers, ensuring consistent environments for application development and deployment.

list.name: Tesseract OCR
list.description: Implemented Tesseract OCR to convert scanned documents and images into searchable and editable text.

list.name: Pinecone
list.info: Vector database for similarity search and RAG
list.description: Utilized Pinecone as a vector database to enhance retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for AI-driven applications.
